notes: Luxurious penthouse-style apartment with high-end modern finishes including curved LED cove lighting, polished tile floors, open-plan kitchen with LG refrigerator and gas stove. Excellent natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. The large wraparound balcony has glass railings that pose a climbing hazard for toddlers - would need safety modifications. Glass coffee table also a concern for baby safety. Being on the top floor (11/11), summer heat may be an issue.
